Package classes.controller

Class FighterController

java.lang.Object
classes.controller.FighterController
public class FighterController
extends java.lang.Object
Connects the GUI with the fighters.

  • Constructor Details

    • FighterController

      public FighterController​(GUI view, javax.swing.JComboBox<Student> fighterInput, java.util.ArrayList<javax.swing.JTextField> characteristicsInput, javax.swing.JComboBox<District> districtsInput, javax.swing.JComboBox<Strategy> strategyInput, javax.swing.JCheckBox reservistInput, javax.swing.JButton button, javax.swing.JButton buttonSeeCredits, javax.swing.border.TitledBorder borderFighter, Game game, Player player)
      Create a new FighterController.
      Parameters:
      view - a reference to the main window
      fighterInput - a reference to the combobox containing the list of fighters
      characteristicsInput - a reference to the fighter's characteristics inputs
      districtsInput - a reference to the combobox containing the list of districts
      strategyInput - a reference to the combobox containing the list of strategies
      reservistInput - a reference to the checkbox to set a fighter as a reservist
      button - a reference to the confirm button
      buttonSeeCredits - a reference to the button to see the credits
      borderFighter - a reference to the titled border container the player's amount of points
      game - a reference to the game
      player - a reference to a player
      See Also:
      Game, Player, init(), setTexts()
